name: M.A.S.S. Mass is Another Space Shooter. Episode 0.5
name_original: M.A.S.S. Mass is Another Space Shooter. Episode 0.5
description:
8-bit version of the mobil VR-game M.A.S.S. (Mass is Another Space Shooter)

Use arrow keys to steer and X to shoot.

This version may contain more then a few bugs
